noun.description: The direction towards the point of the horizon midway between north and west.
The north-western part of a country, region, or town.

adjective.description: Lying towards, near, or facing the north-west.
examples: the north-west corner of the square

adjective.description: Of or denoting the north-western part of a country, region, or town, or its inhabitants.

examples: he turned on to the motorway and headed north-west
